snippet.title: Briley Witch Chronicles 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Briley Witch Chronicles 2, a new RPG for the Commodore 64, PAL and NTSC.
Available for purchase here: https://sarahjaneavory.itch.io/briley-witch-chronicles-2-c64

Follow the continuing adventures of Briley, a modern day girl lost in a strange new world...

Take control of Briley as she continues to explore her new life, aided by Smokey, her grumpy cat - and best friend.

Briley Witch Chronicles 2 is based on books 5 and 6 of the Briley Witch novels: The Fallen Witch, and Grey Waters.

Follow me on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SarahJaneAvory
Itch.io: https://sarahjaneavory.itch.io/
